properties.areaDesc: East Feliciana, LA; East Baton Rouge, LA; Livingston, LA; St. Helena, LA; West Baton Rouge, LA
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 1:37AM CST until February 6 at 4:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana...
Southwestern St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana...
Northwestern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana...
Eastern East Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana...
East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana...

* Until 430 AM CST.

* At 135 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in
the advisory area. Two to three inches of rain have already fallen
since 6 PM CST Wednesday evening.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, Clinton,
Greensburg, Oak Hills Place, Walker, Addis, Brusly, Slaughter,
Westminster, Watson, Darlington, Pride, Shenandoah, Greenwell
Spring, Old Jefferson and Merrydale.

Additional rainfall of one to two inches, with locally heavier
amounts, is expected over the area. This additional rain will result
in minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
